verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> A Song לַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> of degrees אֶשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> I will lift up עֵ֭ינַי <WH5869> mine eyes אֶל־ <WH413> to הֶהָרִ֑ים <WH2022> unto the hills מֵ֝אַ֗יִן <WH370> from whence יָבֹ֥א <WH935> cometh עֶזְרִֽי׃ <WH5828> my help
עֶ֭זְרִי <WH5828> My help מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> from יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> [cometh] from the LORD עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <WH6213> which made שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> and earth

אַל־ <WH408> not יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> He will not suffer לַמּ֣וֹט <WH4132> to be moved רַגְלֶ֑ךָ <WH7272> thy foot אַל־ <WH408> shall not יָ֝נ֗וּם <WH5123> thee will not slumber שֹֽׁמְרֶֽךָ׃ <WH8104> he that keepeth

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will neither יָ֭נוּם <WH5123> shall neither slumber וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יִישָׁ֑ן <WH3462> nor sleep שׁ֝וֹמֵ֗ר <WH8104> Behold he that keepeth יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel
יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD שֹׁמְרֶ֑ךָ <WH8104> [is] thy keeper יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צִ֝לְּךָ֗ <WH6738> [is] thy shade עַל־ <WH5921> and יַ֥ד <WH3027> hand יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> upon thy right
יוֹמָ֗ם <WH3119> thee by day הַשֶּׁ֥מֶשׁ <WH8121> The sun לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יַכֶּ֗כָּה <WH5221> shall not smite וְיָרֵ֥חַ <WH3394> nor the moon בַּלָּֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> by night
יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD יִשְׁמָרְךָ֥ <WH8104> shall preserve מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all רָ֑ע <WH7451> thee from all evil יִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר <WH8104> he shall preserve אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> thy soul

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD יִשְׁמָר־ <WH8104> shall preserve צֵאתְךָ֥ <WH3318> thy going out וּבוֹאֶ֑ךָ <WH935> and thy coming in מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> this וְעַד־ <WH5704> from this time forth and even for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> evermore
